channel.title: About the Hardware category
channel.description:
This category is intended for discussion about the Axoloti hardware and connecting to other hardware, including , connecting midi controllers and other hardware, related hardware projects.
Please read the FAQ at : http://www.axoloti.com/more-info/hardware-faq/
